metadata.title: CVE-2020-16846 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in SaltStack Salt through 3002. Sending crafted webrequests to the Salt API, with the SSH client enabled, can result in shellinjection.

criterions.comment: salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
